overview: Documentary from David Bowie's concert at the Hammersmith Odeon in London on 3 July 1973, when he performed as alter ego Ziggy Stardust for the very last time. The film was shown a few times at festivals in late 1973, and a shortened version of was broadcast on television in 1974, but the film did not receive a full theatrical release until 1983.
original_title: Ziggy  Stardust and the Spiders from Mars
title: Ziggy  Stardust and the Spiders from Mars
